# Yoldosh - Carpooling Service for Uzbekistan

## About
Yoldosh is a modern carpooling platform connecting drivers and passengers across Uzbekistan. We provide safe, affordable, and eco-friendly intercity transportation.

## Services
- Intercity carpooling
- Real-time trip search
- Verified drivers
- Secure booking system
- Multi-language support (Uzbek, Russian, English)

## Coverage
We operate across all regions of Uzbekistan including:
- Tashkent
- Samarkand
- Bukhara
- Khiva
- Fergana Valley
- And all other major cities

## Key Features
- Driver verification system
- Transparent pricing
- Rating and review system
- 24/7 customer support
- Easy booking process
- Flexible payment options

## Contact
Website: https://yoldosh.uz
Email: support@yoldosh.uz

## API
